branchCategory.name: C(D)J2-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Port Options
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CJ2-XC3 allows the rear port location to be specified. CJ2-XC51 includes selectable hose nipples in the ports. They are double acting single rod, stainless steel tube, air cylinders. Available in 7 mounting types for versatility. Pivot and rod end brackets can be ordered with the cylinder under one part number</p>
